name: Greater Water Elemental
flavor: A huge living wave that crashes down upon enemies.

features.name: Water Jet - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to attack a target within Very Close range. On a success, deal 2d4+7 physical damage and the targetâ€™s next action has disadvantage. On a failure, the target must mark a Stress.

features.name: Drowning Embrace - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets the Elemental succeeds against become Restrained and Vulnerable as they begin drowning. A target can break free, ending both conditions, with a successful Strength or Instinct Roll.

features.name: High Tide - Reaction
features.desc: When the Elemental makes a successful standard attack, you can mark a Stress to knock the target back to Close range.
